definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: inner ;—´[[פ]] 1Ki 6:27 +; f. [[פְּנִימִית]] v:1Ki 6:36 + ; mpl. [[פְּנִימִים]] 1Ch 28:11; fpl. [[פְּנִימִיּוֹת]] 2Ch 4:22; —a1w. c. art., and alw. of parts of building, usu. temple : 1Ki 6:27, 1Ki 7:12 + ; esp. Ez Eze 8:3, Eze 8:16, Eze 10:3 + 21 t. Eze 40-46 ; as subst. [[בַּפְּנִימִי]] Eze 41:17 on the inside (but dub., v. Co al.); [[אֶל־הַפְּנִימִית]] Eze 42:4 toward the inside (del. LXX. SyrVer Co Toy al.).
